title: American-style jumbo peanut butter muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g peanut butter (melted)', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium egg', '200ml semi-skimmed milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g peanut butter chips']
